Articles.Content: t h i s i s a p o l l

Breaking ground didn't have enough in it, robotics were crappy, ground experiments boring, etc.

Making history was a well made DLC and added useful parts and a nice new size.

Breaking Ground adds hinges and pistons and other moving parts. It made things possible that could previously only be done through clever but janky workarounds.

This DLC was... 

 

 

... ground breaking 

Edited September 28, 2022 by Deddly
They are both good, but pistons and hinges for the win.
Hey wait, we can vote for both options? I guess that would mean we value them equally?

Breaking Ground - but really for the propeller engines.  Pistons/hinges etc. meh

Making History only for the parts - which is effectively supplied by ReStockPlus which you would want ReStock anyway to make it all Moar NICE!.
